thread.title: Russia will defend its interests by all means - Lavrov

title: Russia will defend its interests by all means - Lavrov
text:
Russia will defend its interests by all means - Lavrov 5:45am EDT - 01:11 
Russia's Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov says Moscow will defend itself by using the ''the whole arsenal of means at our disposal'' in response to the diplomatic fallout following the poisoning of Sergei Skripal. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
